titleStmt.title: Suum cuiq, or, Every one his own in a short discourse on the 21th. ver. of the 22th. chapt of St. Matthew : first preached, from the firm principles of his own loyalty, then published, to gratify the free proposals of a neighbours generosity / by J. Wyllys ...
titleStmt.author: Wyllys, J.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
